text.section: Unless the articles of organization or bylaws provide otherwise, regular meetings of the board of directors may be held without notice of the date, time, place or purpose of the meeting.

Unless the articles of organization or bylaws otherwise provide, special meetings of the board of directors must be preceded by at least 2 daysâ€™ notice of the date, time and place of the meeting. The notice need not describe the purpose of the special meeting unless required by the articles of organization or bylaws.
